name: Rollerball
overview: Created by Harald Müller (Mueller) and published by Intersoft. An endless runner type game as we see many of these days. Guide the ball along the obstacle track that sprawls out into the horizon in space. Different colors will have different impacts on your ball. The game is a clone of the classic game Trailblazer, which was first developed by Shaun Southern (one of the founders of Magnetic Fields, who developed the Lotus series) for the Commodore 16/Plus 4 computers.
